item.title: Hoverfly & wild pollinators research at Botanic Garden Wales
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: On a recent visit to Botanic Garden Wales, I met up with Abigail Lowe, a PhD student with the Garden’s Science Team who is continuing the critical research into which flowers pollinators prefer, focussing on the role of hoverflies.

item.title: Flowers for pollinators in an orchard
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: Steve Wilson, the tutor at a recent People’s Orchard grafting workshop, discussed how his wildflower meadow encourages pollinators.
